faqs.question: What is this platform about?
faqs.answer: We provide a marketplace where buyers can find reconditioned vehicles from trusted sellers.

faqs.question: Do you sell vehicles directly?
faqs.answer: No, we don’t sell vehicles ourselves. We connect buyers with sellers through our platform.

faqs.question: How can I find a vehicle?
faqs.answer: You can browse listings, compare options, and contact sellers directly through our platform.

faqs.question: Is there a fee to use the platform?
faqs.answer: Our platform is free for buyers. However, sellers may have listing fees depending on the plan they choose.

faqs.question: How do I contact a seller?
faqs.answer: Each listing has a contact option where you can directly reach out to the seller for more details.

faqs.question: Are the vehicles inspected before listing?
faqs.answer: Sellers are responsible for providing accurate details. We recommend buyers verify the condition before purchase.

faqs.question: Can I list my vehicle for sale?
faqs.answer: Yes! If you're a seller, you can create an account and list your reconditioned vehicle.

terms.title: Introduction
terms.content: Welcome to our website. These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of our website and services.

terms.title: User Agreement
terms.content: By accessing and using our website, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. If you do not agree to these terms and conditions, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site.

terms.title: Privacy Policy
terms.content: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

terms.title: Intellectual Property
terms.content: All content on this website, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, and images, is the property of our company and is protected by copyright laws.

terms.title: Limitation of Liability
terms.content: In no event will we be liable for any loss or damage including without limitation, indirect or consequential loss or damage, or any loss or damage whatsoever arising from loss of data or profits arising out of or in connection with the use of this website.

terms.title: Indemnification
terms.content: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless our company, its affiliates, officers, agents, and employees from any claim or demand, including reasonable attorneys' fees, made by any third party due to or arising out of your breach of these terms and conditions or your violation of any law or the rights of a third party.

terms.title: Severability
terms.content: If any provision of these terms and conditions is found to be invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions will continue in full force and effect.

terms.title: Governing Law
terms.content: These terms and conditions shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of [Your State], without regard to its conflict of law principles.

terms.title: Changes to Terms and Conditions
terms.content: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these terms and conditions at any time. It is your responsibility to check this page periodically for changes. Your continued use of or access to the website following the posting of any changes constitutes acceptance of those changes.
